memberdef.name: CONFIG_EG_EFF_TOOL
memberdef.initializer: if( !TOOLHANDLE.isUserConfigured() ) { \ SET_DUAL_TOOL(TOOLHANDLE, AsgElectronEfficiencyCorrectionTool, TOOLNAME); \ std::vector< std::string > corrFileNameList = {CORRFILE}; \ ATH_CHECK( TOOLHANDLE.setProperty("CorrectionFileNameList", corrFileNameList) ); \ if(!isData()) \ ATH_CHECK (TOOLHANDLE.setProperty("ForceDataType", (int) data_type) ); \ ATH_CHECK( TOOLHANDLE.setProperty("CorrelationModel", m_EG_corrModel) ); \ ATH_CHECK( TOOLHANDLE.initialize() ); \ }

memberdef.name: CONFIG_EG_EFF_TOOL_KEY
memberdef.initializer: if( !TOOLHANDLE.isUserConfigured() ) { \ SET_DUAL_TOOL(TOOLHANDLE, AsgElectronEfficiencyCorrectionTool, TOOLNAME); \ std::cout << "Will now set key \"" << KEYNAME << "\" to value \"" << KEY << "\" when configuring an AsgElectronEfficiencyCorrectionTool" << std::endl; \ ATH_CHECK( TOOLHANDLE.setProperty(KEYNAME, KEY) ); \ if(!isData()) \ ATH_CHECK (TOOLHANDLE.setProperty("ForceDataType", (int) data_type) ); \ ATH_CHECK( TOOLHANDLE.setProperty("CorrelationModel", m_EG_corrModel) ); \ ATH_CHECK( TOOLHANDLE.initialize() ); \ }

memberdef.name: CONFIG_TAU_TRIGEFF_TOOL
memberdef.initializer: if (!TOOLHANDLE.isUserConfigured() && tau_trig_support.size() > INDEX && !isData()) { \ toolName = "TauTrigEffTool_" + std::to_string(TAUID) + "_" + TRIGGER; \ SET_DUAL_TOOL(TOOLHANDLE, TauAnalysisTools::TauEfficiencyCorrectionsTool, toolName); \ ATH_CHECK(TOOLHANDLE.setProperty("EfficiencyCorrectionTypes", std::vector<int>({TauAnalysisTools::SFTriggerHadTau}) )); \ ATH_CHECK(TOOLHANDLE.setProperty("TriggerName", TRIGGER)); \ ATH_CHECK(TOOLHANDLE.setProperty("IDLevel", TAUID )); \ ATH_CHECK(TOOLHANDLE.setProperty("PileupReweightingTool", m_prwTool.getHandle() )); \ ATH_CHECK(TOOLHANDLE.retrieve()); \ }
